name: Find The Difference! Rooms HD
description:
Girls and boys, ladies and gentlemen, try to find the difference!

Are you ready? What's the difference?

Compare two images, search and find differences. Get hints for fast difference detection.

- 200 beautiful interior HD images
- 5 differences per level
- no time limit
- online and offline
- 3 hints per level
- Earn credits
- Use zoom for better search and to find challenging differences
- Pictures of beautiful rooms
- Relaxing music
- Play on your smartphone or tablet.

Find the difference is the best way to have fun when you're bored!

Are you addicted to finding the differences but out of hints?
Find the difference detectives can earn credits to replenish their hints.
How many credits can you earn with your eagle eyes?
Try to find the difference without hints or help.

Challenge your friends and invite them to play Find The Difference Rooms too - for free!

Have questions, suggestions or simply love our Find The Difference game please leave a review and tell us about it.

Find The Difference is counting on you!
